title: Angela Rye joins the show
description:
Angela Rye joins Jalen & Jacoby to discuss her exclusive sit-down interview with Brittney Griner’s wife. Find out what she learned when talking to the superstar basketball player still detained in Russia. Also, 2 years after the murder of George Floyd, Angela and the guys breakdown whether or not we are better as a society 2 years later. Plus, Luka and the Mavs keep their playoff run alive by beating the Warriors in game 4. Find out if the Warriors need to wrap things up in game 5 for their championship hopes. Also, game 5 Celtics-Heat tonight. Is it skill or health that will determine tonight’s winner? Find out all that and more. 
 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
